document.full_text: washington redskins football player albert haynesworth was indicted by a grand jury on tuesday for allegedly fondling a server at a swanky hotel bar in the u.s. capital, u.s. prosecutors said.
document.title: redskins' haynesworth charged in fondling incident
lines_and_colors: washington redskins football player albert haynesworth was indicted by a grand jury on tuesday for allegedly fondling a server at a swanky hotel bar in the u.s. capital, u.s. prosecutors said.
